messages.author: sgk
messages.text: How about translating not into sh but into Python?  The general portability is significantly better, and that's what we're doing with a lot of the other scripts.

messages.author: Mark Mentovai
messages.text: Be sure to set svn:executable on this.  You've invoked it in the .gyp file without calling 'sh' first, so this must be executable.

messages.author: Mark Mentovai
